item.title: M365 Development Security - From full trust to ZeroTrust
item.description: This article will showcase typical SharePoint and Microsoft 365 development security patterns. Those patterns can be applied especially in so-called ZeroTrust environments, too, and are linked to step-by-step implementation guidances.

item.title: How to use the Power Platform developer plan with the Microsoft 365 Developer program
item.description: What is Microsoft 365 Developer Account? The Microsoft 365 Developer Program includes a Microsoft 365 E5 developer subscription that you can use to create your own sandbox and develop solutions independent of your production environment.

item.title: How to rename files in SharePoint with Power Automate
item.description: Although SharePoint and Power Automate are heavily interwoven, there is no “rename file” action in Power Automate - if the file lives in a SharePoint library.
